title: Xbox & Nintendo Respond to PS5 Price Increase - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.26.22

Go to http://meundies.com/kindafunny to get 20% off your first order plus free shipping.

Blessing and Gary talk about Microsoft and Nintendo's response to PlayStation 5's price increase, Amazon not buying EA, and some Bioshock movie updates.
